name: Tentacle Pendants: Hard Nylon
description: Please go to the new store at http://theatomicsoul.storenvy.com Tentacle Pendants! Includes a Free Braided Leather Necklace! DIY WHITE: The white is perfect for creating your own color schemes, designs, and patterns! All you need are regular markers to design your own tentacles! I do suggest spraying them with an Acrylic sealer when done, though prior tests have not faded or worn off. ------------- ON SALE! Ending the Pre-colored Tentacles so they're for sale for $5! The reason for the change is due to the way the prior manufacturer colored them. These will need to be sprayed with an acrylic coat after you get them the color/ way you want them. Some have gotten a slight color bleed from a hemp cord that was in with them. This may come off but I do not have the time to try. -------------- Necklace Note: The necklace will be black unless a different color is requested. Available Colors: Black, Blue, Red, Orange (Add color choice to the Notes in Paypal.) View Necklace Selection for more information and color options.

name: Mayan Tags! Quetzalcoatl & The Mayan Calendar
description: Please go to the new store at http://theatomicsoul.storenvy.com Mayan Tags! Perfect for Key Chains, Zipper Pulls, Earrings, Bag Tags, and more! Includes a Free Braided Leather Necklace! --- MAYAN CALENDAR TAG The Mayan Calendar ends in 2012: What will come next? With this tag you will remember to be prepared! Black Nickel with White Enamel, these striking highly detailed tags are sure to draw attention! --- QUETZALCOATL TAG Quetzalcoatl is best known as a feathered serpent deity throughout the Mesoamerican beliefs and primarily represents a God of Knowledge. Among the Aztecs, whose beliefs are the best-documented in the historical sources, Quetzalcoatl was related to gods of the wind, of Venus, of the dawn, of merchants and of arts, crafts and knowledge. He was also the patron god of the Aztec priesthood, of learning and knowledge. -------------- Necklace Note: The necklace will be black unless a different color is requested. Available Colors: Black, Blue, Red, Orange (Add color choice to the Notes in Paypal.) View Necklace Page for more information.
